title: Our First Impressions of Xbox Series X | The Escapist Show
description:
Join our YouTube Membership program for Early Access to videos, badges, emojis, bonus content and more. ►► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqg5FCR7NrpvlBWMXdt-5Vg/join

This week on The Escapist Show we discuss our first impressions of the Xbox Series X & Assassin's Creed: Valhalla and Jack has been converted into a Stadia user. 

Timestamps
Assassin's Creed: Valhalla - 0:00 - 7:40
Baldur's Gate 3 - 7:41 - 14:39
Xbox Series X - 14:40 - 24:40
